name: matomo
description: Matomo is a self-hosted web analytics platform that respects user privacy while providing detailed insights into web traffic. It supports tracking, heatmaps, A/B testing, and integrates with many CMS and eCommerce tools.
features: Privacy-focused analytics: Track website visitors while respecting privacy with GDPR-compliant data collection.
Real-time reports: Monitor current visitors, page views, and user actions as they happen.
Heatmaps: Visualize where users click, scroll, and interact on your web pages.
A/B testing: Run experiments to compare different versions of pages and measure conversion impact.
Goal tracking: Define and measure conversion goals like form submissions or purchases.
E-commerce analytics: Track product views, cart additions, and revenue with detailed transaction data.
Custom dimensions: Add custom data points to track specific user attributes or behaviors.
Segment analysis: Filter and analyze visitor data by demographics, behavior, or custom criteria.
Campaign tracking: Measure effectiveness of marketing campaigns with UTM parameter support.
API access: Extract analytics data programmatically or integrate with other tools via REST API.
Multi-site support: Manage analytics for multiple websites from a single Matomo installation.
Plugin ecosystem: Extend functionality with official and community-developed plugins.
